name: DevBashScorekeeper
0:
”Alexa tell score keeper to start a new game”
”Alexa tell score keeper orange scored three points”
”Alexa ask score keeper what's the score”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: score keeper
des:
A simple scorekeeping skill. Start a new game with "start a new game". Supports two teams only, named white and orange. You can add points, subtract points, set a given teams score explicitly, enable a win by two rule, and set a score goal.

Turn on win by two - "you must win by two", "enable the win by two rule"

Set a score goal - "We're playing to ten", "set the max score to ten"

Add points - "orange scored two points", "give orange two points", "add five points to orange"

Subtract points - "take two points away from orange"

Set a teams score - "Set orange to five points"

Check the score - "What's the score?"

Check the score goal - "What are we playing to?"

If a score goal is set, the game is declared over when either team reaches that score. If "win by two" is enabled then they will only be declared winners if they have 2 or more points than the opposing team.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
